entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR: Using IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in native AOT #56179
    Backlog
  • Allow `ProducesProblem` on `RouteGroupBuilder` #56178
  • Aggregate multiple `Produces` for same status code but different content-types #56177
  • [Blazor] DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints unexpected exception #56176
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56174
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #56173
  • Add support for emitting ServerSentEvents from minimal APIs #56172
    9.0.0
  • MSB8020 error when building the repo #56171
  • Make `dotnet-user-jwts` support custom appsettings json file #56169
  • Blazor WebAssembly does not reload dotnet.js after .NET 8 update #56168
  • New and improved `kestrel.connection.duration` tags: `error.type` and protocol error #56164
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #56161
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #56160
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56159
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #56158
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56157
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56156
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #56155
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56154
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #56153
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56152
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56151
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56150
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #56149
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #56148
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #56147
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56146

Closed

  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56140
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #56136
  • Two-way binding issue for `Dictionary` values in InteractiveServer component #56145
    Backlog
  • Validation Model not compiling #55999
  • Blazor WebAssembly does not work after upgrade #55870
  • Function call from Blazor app gets stuck, works fine from Web API app #56020

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56181
    area-blazor
  • Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 #56180
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add support for reference-based schemas in OpenAPI document #56175
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24309.2 #56163
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56123
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Annotate SignalR client for native AOT #56079
    area-signalr, NativeAOT

Updated

  • Add codefixer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix urls in ProjectTemplates/README #55984
    area-mvc
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
  • ASP0022 - Fix false positive for groups without using intermediate variables #56116
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
